entities.description: The count of occurrences of different values in the dataset.
The total number of valid cases in the dataset.
Statistical information such as standard deviation, mean, median, mode, minimum, and maximum values of the dataset.
Different population groups referred to in the dataset. E.g. LAST POPULATION 2 and CURRENT POPULATION 3.
The specific location in the dataset terms of width and decimal for numeric values.
The type of variable in the dataset.
Range of missing values in the dataset.

relationships.description: Relates the population group to its statistical information.
Indicates the frequency of different values within the population group.
Indicates the total number of valid cases within the dataset.
Marks the position of a numeric value in terms of width and decimal places.
Defines the type of a variable in the dataset.
Indicates the range of missing values for the variable.
